segments.text: Honey , can you set the table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um , sure . What are we having for dinner ? Do I need to put out anything in particular ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , make sure to put out the pepper and salt shakers . I don ’ t know if your brother is coming tonight so set an extra place mat just in case .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , should I use the fancy silverware ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah go ahead , forks , spoons and knives . I roasted some meat so be sure to put out some steak knives as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll also set some cups and saucers for some coffee after dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey ? Have you seen our soup bowls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are in the cupboard where you keep the gravy boat and serving dishes . Just be careful because the wine glasses are also there .
segments.speaker: S2
